```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# Tidy tuesday: Meteorites - week 06-11-2019 

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(maps)
```
Import & glimpse data
```{r}
meteor<- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-06-11/meteorites.csv")

glimpse(meteor)
meteor
skim(meteor)
summary(meteor)
```

```{r}
ggplot(meteor, aes(log10(mass))) +
   geom_histogram()

meteor %>% filter(year >= 1900 & year != 2101) %>% 
ggplot(aes(year)) +
   geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)

```

Plot on world map
```{r}
world <- map_data("world")

world %>% arrange(desc(lat))

meteor.plot <- filter(meteor, between(long, -200, 200) & lat >= -85.1)

ggplot(world) +
   geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group)) +
   geom_point(data = meteor.plot, aes(x = long, y = lat), size = .05, color = "red") +
   theme_minimal() +
   ylim(c(-84.9, 83.59961))

```

```{r}
meteor %>% arrange(lat) %>% View()
```
